Shipping: *I make it a practice to reuse and recycle shipping materials whenever I can…not only for financial reasons, but for ecological reasons. Paypal payments made on Mon-Fri will be shipped 24-48 Hours after payment (usually 24 hours). Paypal payments made on Saturday, Sunday will be mailed on Monday. Paypal payments made on Holidays will be mailed the next business day. I send an email stating that the item has been shipped. Paypal Payments will go to the address on the paypal account unless you notify me. Refunds: Please ask questions, check measurements and read item descriptions very carefully.
